name: SuperJumpsuit RotateDash World
description:
An arcade platformer brings you back to childhood. A creative puzzle platformer like you've never seen before.
You don’t need to jump, all you need is to manipulate gravity to rotate the level to navigating through the maze.
Give up your conventional way of thinking, this is not a classic arcade platformer like Mario or Megaman.

Even you can make the way to the end, it’s extremely hard to gather all gems in the level.
Some gems are in tricky position which requires your creative thinking to get them.

-Important information-
This game is a free version and only default character is unlocked.
You can download the VIP version for new characters, unlimited lives and level editor mode which is coming soon!
VIP version: https://apps.apple.com/us/app/superjumpsuit-rotatedash-vip/id1464780984

Super Jumpsuit is a nighthood thief who sneaks out at night to the mysterious land to steal gems. The land is full of traps, enemies and gravity change setup.

-Old-fashioned 90's pixel art.
-Old-school 16bit electrical music soundtracks and sound effects.
-Easy gamepad control.
-Addictive stages.
-Boss fight.
